update TemplateSnapshot set BusinessId = #{businessid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TemplateName = #{templatename,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CreateName = #{createname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LastOptName = #{lastoptname,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, LastOptTime = #{lastopttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
select @@IDENTITY as templateSnapshotId
Insert into TemplateSnapshot(BusinessId, TemplateName, CreateName, CreateTime, LastOptName, LastOptTime, Status, Remark) select BusinessId, TemplateName, CreateName, CreateTime, LastOptName, LastOptTime, Status, Remark from Template WHERE id=#{templateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
